overview: Love can be deceiving, but sex is always true. The Sexual Suspect knows this, and he plays it to his advantage, taking what he wants and leaving the rest behind. The thing I like about him most is his uninhibited sexual prowess. He's all about sex, anytime, anywhere, anyway. But don't get too attached; he'll only screw you in the end. Sure, we're all looking for love, but will you settle for sex? He suspects you will.
title: Sexual Suspect
